member.name: T:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper
member.summary: A wrapper for the discord client from the "Discord.NET" discord client library. (https://github.com/discord-net/Discord.Net)

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper.InitializeAsync
member.summary: Awaits the initialization of the discord client asynchronously.
member.returns: a task that represents the asynchronous operation

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper.#ctor(Discord.WebSocket.DiscordShardedClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper.#ctor(Discord.WebSocket.DiscordSocketClient)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper.#ctor(Discord.WebSocket.BaseSocketClient,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.exception: thrown if the specified shard count is less than 1.

member.name: E:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper.VoiceServerUpdated
member.summary: An asynchronous event which is triggered when the voice server was updated.

member.name: E:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper.VoiceStateUpdated
member.summary: An asynchronous event which is triggered when a user voice state was updated.

member.name: P:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper.CurrentUserId
member.summary: Gets the current user snowflake identifier value.

member.name: P:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper.ShardCount
member.summary: Gets the number of total shards the bot uses.

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the wrapper and unregisters all events attached to the discord client.

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper.SendVoiceUpdateAsync(System.UInt64,System.Nullable{System.UInt64},System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a voice channel state update asynchronously.
member.param: the snowflake identifier of the voice channel to join (if the client should disconnect from the voice channel).
a value indicating whether the bot user should be self deafened
a value indicating whether the bot user should be self muted
member.returns: a task that represents the asynchronous operation

member.name: M:Lavalink4NET.Discord_NET.DiscordClientWrapper.GetChannelUsersAsync(System.UInt64,System.UInt64)
member.summary: Gets the snowflake identifier values of the users in the voice channel specified by (the snowflake identifier of the voice channel).
member.param: the guild identifier snowflake where the channel is in
the snowflake identifier of the voice channel
member.returns:
a task that represents the asynchronous operation
the snowflake identifier values of the users in the voice channel
